needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are:

1. Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
2. A group of 8 people work well; a group of 20 thrives; a group of 50 is unwieldy.
